content:
Hello,

I wanted to gauge the community's interest in an alternate design that will allow payers to meet payer-to-payer requirements without converting clinical data from point-in-time sources.

This proposal is a custom FHIR operation "$open-access". We can workshop how it functions but I included one flow as an example. This operation has a low implementation burden and risk when compared to converting point-in-time clinical sources.

Any interest from this group?
White-Board.png first draft for an outline. Open to any feedback.
